subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Real Time EVP Recorder
author: Tim Woolworth
full_text:
I haven't used it yet, but I am going to a conference next weekend where the
maker of the device (Gary Galka) is allowing the attendees to use it on an
investigation.  If you don't find out any info from anyone else, I'll gladly
let you know next Monday if it is worth the money if you put up a reminder
post.  I have been an investigator for years and have had my eye on this
piece but I haven't been able to justify purchasing it yet.  I am eager to
know if it is worth it myself!

Tim
